ygData.subject: Re: Range Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately, there is not much you can do.  Nearly all ranged weapons except bows do pathetic damage, and we can t use bows.  You will just have to chase
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, Su-chan wrote:
>
> I would like to get a good range weapon, but I don't know which or where
> find it. It is very annoying when de mob runs away when nit is close to
> death.

Unfortunately, there is not much you can do. Nearly all
ranged weapons except bows do pathetic damage, and we can't
use bows. You will just have to chase it until you get Bellow
at L12, and Chain at L23.

> And there is any difference between a drum or a battle drum? Or between a
> lute or a mandoline (or whatever is the other string instrument in the bard
> guild)

We need to make an FAQ. :-) The battle drum is better, but
good luck getting one. There is no difference between the
lute and mandolin other than weight and price. Verant was
planning to have the two have slightly different effects on
the stringed instrument songs, but never got around to
implementing it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
